TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TreeViewEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

summary.span: 为 控件的以下事件提供数据：、、 或 。

span.span: Provides data for the , , , or events of a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅 [处理和引发事件](/dotnet/standard/events/)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](/dotnet/standard/events/). ## Examples 下面的示例演示了自定义的 。The following example illustrates a customized . 通过继承 类，此自定义版本具有正常的所有功能 。By inheriting the class, this custom version has all the functionality of a normal . 更改构造函数中的各种属性值提供了独特的外观。Changing various property values in the constructor provides a unique appearance. 因为该 属性设置为 false，所以，自定义控件也会重写 方法，以便在单击节点时展开和折叠节点。Because the property is set to false, the customized control also overrides the method so nodes can be expanded and collapsed when they are clicked. 以这种方式自定义的控件可以在整个组织中使用，从而可以轻松地提供一致的接口，而无需在每个单独的项目中指定控件属性。A control that is customized in this way can be used throughout an organization, making it easy to provide a consistent interface without requiring the control properties to be specified in each individual project. [!code-cpp[TreeViewCustomization#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewCustomization/CPP/treeviewcustomization.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[TreeViewCustomization#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewCustomization/CS/treeviewcustomization.cs#2)] [!code-vb[TreeViewCustomization#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/TreeViewCustomization/VB/treeviewcustomization.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示了自定义的 。The following example illustrates a customized . 通过继承 类，此自定义版本具有正常的所有功能 。By inheriting the class, this custom version has all the functionality of a normal . 更改构造函数中的各种属性值提供了独特的外观。Changing various property values in the constructor provides a unique appearance. 因为该 属性设置为 false，所以，自定义控件也会重写 方法，以便在单击节点时展开和折叠节点。Because the property is set to false, the customized control also overrides the method so nodes can be expanded and collapsed when they are clicked. 以这种方式自定义的控件可以在整个组织中使用，从而可以轻松地提供一致的接口，而无需在每个单独的项目中指定控件属性。A control that is customized in this way can be used throughout an organization, making it easy to provide a consistent interface without requiring the control properties to be specified in each individual project.
